2164.subject: HOSP
2164.descrlong:
Fosters personal relevance of and appreciation for an area leading to behavioral changes among visitors. Examines philosophies, methods, ethics, research, and controversies involved with modern interpretation practices in ecotourism. May require field trips. Course completion results in Certified Interpretive Host certification from the Nat'l Assoc of Interpretation. (Sections may be offered as classroom-based, hybrid or online courses.)

[Prereq: ENVS 201 and (BUS 305 or ENVS 284 or SBS 351)]
